Posts.Content: I can only offer my prayers and heartfelt concern - my husband had Taxol and Carbo for head and neck.  I realize that a "cocktail" of the two would be totally different. He did lose his hair - Hugs and prayers!!
Posts.Title: side effects of Taxol

Posts.Content: My husband chokes and strangles on EVERYTHING that is swallowed including his own saliva.   All of his Drs., Dentists, Oral Surgeon, Swallow Therapist (the list goes on) - understand this.   Surely you can explain this to your dentist - if they don't understand the damage then you need a dentist/oral surgeon who is very well versed in radiation damage.   Good luck and God Bless You!
Posts.Title: Inside throat very small since radiation to clavicle post bc
